review: It is not a bad deal when it was $19 on Sale, It works well, don't buy into that this is better than a chromecast because it has a quad core cpu and more memory. Totally unneeded for watching videos.
author: Amazon Customer IAEN

review: I love the Fire Stick! I have a Chrome Cast also, and the Fire Stick is some much easier to use since it comes with a remote and you don't need another device to stream with.  The only edge that the Chrome Cast had over the Fire Stick was the HBO GO app, but now that the app is due out soon, I had to give it a 5 star.  The Chrome Cast is still able to use the Chrome browser to stream with, but I never use that since everything I use has an app.
author: Joshua Gall

review: I bought this at Christmas and have been very happy with it, so much that I have one in all of the bedrooms now as well. The only complaint that I have is that the hit my card for the amazon prime subscription before my 30 trial period was up.
author: James Hoffman

review: OMG.This is absolutely the best.Really easy to setup and use.Lots of movie choices.Great product
author: gail

review: Only used it twice...so we'll see if it's worth it down the road
author: Heather Eastside Entrepreneur

review: easy setup, easy to use for movies music photos so far great.
author: Greg. B

review: I use Fire TV Stick on extra TV where I do not have Xbox. Tons of apps and easy access to my Amazon Prime movies. Excellent picture quality.
author: Mister C

review: Having a hard time keeping it online. Need to have better customer support that we can call for issues. Might return it
author: Gloria turner

review: Easy to use, lots of programs to choose from. Highly recommend.
author: Meoow555
